trans-unit.source: Defines an attribute applied to properties that contain ID references.
trans-unit.target: 定义应用于包含 ID 引用的属性的属性。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute> class is applied to properties that contain ID references.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute>类应用于包含 ID 的引用的属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content.ContentPlaceHolderID%2A> is an example of a property that contains an ID reference.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content.ContentPlaceHolderID%2A> 是一个包含 ID 引用属性的示例。

trans-unit.source: When this attribute is applied, designers can provide additional functionality during design time, such as listing IDs.
trans-unit.target: 应用此属性时，设计器可以在设计期间，如列出 Id 提供附加功能。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute> attribute is applied to a property that evaluates to a string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何<xref:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute>特性应用于一个属性，计算结果为字符串。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the `DataSourceID` member identifies a data source control and therefore specifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> type.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，`DataSourceID`成员标识一个数据源控件，并因此指定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When you call this constructor, the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute.ReferencedControlType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>, which is its default value.
trans-unit.target: 当调用此构造函数，<xref:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute.ReferencedControlType%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>，这是其默认值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute> attribute is applied to a property that evaluates to a string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何<xref:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute>特性应用于一个属性，计算结果为字符串。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the `DataSourceID` member identifies a data source control at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，`DataSourceID`成员在运行时标识一个数据源控件。

trans-unit.source: By using the default constructor, the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute.ReferencedControlType%2A> property is set to the default value, <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用默认构造函数，<xref:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute.ReferencedControlType%2A>属性设置为默认值， <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that specifies the type of the control represented by the property to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute" /> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Type" />，指定由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute" /> 应用到的属性所表示的控件类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute" /> class using the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的类型初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute> attribute is applied to a property that evaluates to a string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何<xref:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute>特性应用于一个属性，计算结果为字符串。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the `DataSourceID` member identifies a data source control and therefore specifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> type.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，`DataSourceID`成员标识一个数据源控件，并因此指定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>类型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with this instance or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 要与此实例或 null 引用 （Visual Basic 中的 <see langword="Nothing" />）进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示此实例是否与指定的对象相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> equals the type and value of this instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 等于此实例的类型和值，则为 <paramref name="obj" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位有符号整数哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the controls allowed by the property to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute" /> attribute is applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute" /> 特性应用到的属性所允许的控件类型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the type of control allowed by the property to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute" /> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Type" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute" /> 应用到的属性所允许的控件类型。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" />。
